name: ITZY
description: ITZY is a girl group known for their self-confidence anthems, powerful choreography, and 'teen crush' concept that inspires young fans worldwide.

funFacts: Known for her cat-like sharp eyes and visuals
Exceptional dancer considered one of the best in 4th gen
Very caring leader who looks after members
Has a contrast between fierce stage presence and soft personality
Her cat eyes became her signature look
members.bio: Yeji is ITZY's leader and main dancer known for her fierce cat-like visuals. Her sharp eyes and powerful dance skills have made her a '4th gen girl crush.' Despite her intimidating stage presence, she's known as a caring, gentle leader.

funFacts: Lived in Canada for several years, fluent in English
Known for her powerful, emotional vocals
Has a teddy bear-like cute appearance
Very honest and straightforward personality
Often shares her struggles openly with fans
members.bio: Lia is ITZY's main vocalist with powerful, emotional vocals. Having lived in Canada, she's fluent in English. Despite her cute teddy bear looks, she delivers surprisingly powerful vocals that anchor ITZY's sound.

funFacts: Her 'MITM' shoulder dance went viral globally
Was recruited after appearing on Got7's music video
Known for her sharp features and charismatic aura
Her 'shoulder gangster' moves are iconic
Very introverted but transforms on stage
members.bio: Ryujin is ITZY's center and the '4th gen it girl.' Her 'MITM' shoulder dance went viral and cemented her status. Her charismatic stage presence and sharp features have made her one of the most popular idols in K-pop.

funFacts: Sister of IZ*ONE/LE SSERAFIM's Chaeyeon
Known for her technical, precise dancing
Appeared on K-Pop Star 3 as a child
Very sweet, gentle personality
Has been training since a very young age
members.bio: Chaeryeong is ITZY's main dancer known for her technical precision. She's the sister of dancer Chaeyeon (former IZ*ONE). Her sweet personality contrasts with her sharp, precise dance skills that make her moves stand out.

funFacts: Tallest member at 170cm
Known for her bright, energetic personality
Has puppy-like visuals and energy
Despite being maknae, very confident and outgoing
Her smile and energy are contagious
members.bio: Yuna is ITZY's tall maknae and visual queen. At 170cm, she stands out with her model-like proportions. Her bright, puppy-like energy and confident personality make her a beloved maknae who lights up every stage.

seo.title: ITZY Name Generator | Create Your Korean Name with MIDZY
seo.description: Create your ITZY name with Yeji, Lia, Ryujin, Chaeryeong & Yuna! Get instant chemistry scores and Korean stage names. Perfect for MIDZY fans.
